subsection_analysis.refined_text: This chapter has mainly discussed the main features of Bitcoin,
Bitcoin is a decentralized network and a digital currency that uses a peer-to-peer system to verify and process transactions.

The ideas for this chapter originated from the expertise of David Lee, especially in his introductory lectures on Bitcoin, and from Lam Pak Nian’s earlier research on Bitcoin during his undergraduate degree.
To a layperson, bitcoin is a digital currency that is created and held electronically.
The top 3 things I learned at the bitcoin conference.

Like many created after it, Bitcoin uses the power of the Internet to process its transactions.
